title: Crosby on the Columbian Exchange-Secondary SAQ

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Use the passage to answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Based on the first paragraph, identify ONE argument made in the “classic narrative” of the Columbian encounter. b) Explain ONE development in the sixteenth century that would support the arguments of the “new generation of historians” in the second paragraph. c) Describe ONE way the “biological competition” referred to in the second paragraph contributed to European imperialism in the Americas.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
